It served its purpose for a holiday non-profit gala, but realize it's a very average dress as far as quality, and it is not for a small person. I wish Amazon would find a petite, high quality outfitter.

评论概述: Nice Fabric, Pretty Details, Great price!
评论详情: I bought this in black and was pleasantly surprised by the quality. The darting detail on the top and the inseam zipper in the back are spot on. It looks much more expensive than it is. I wore this to an event and felt very comfortable and feminine with the pretty ruffles and sexy wrap dress detail in the skirt. I am a 12-14 and the large fit perfectly.

I read some review that said this dress runs big, however, I felt like it ran a little small.  I ordered a Medium and I am 5' 4" 140 lbs.  It was too snug in the arms and across my back.  I re-ordered a Large and it is slightly too big, but still looks very nice.  I guess it depends on if you want the upper part of it to be completely form fitting - if so, stick to your normal size, if you want a little wiggle room, order up a size.

I wasn’t expecting much at this price point but was very pleasantly surprised. The fit of size L  was perfect on me which is unusual! 5’2 145 and usually a 10 or 12 in a dress. The material is  a nice weight with forgiving stretch and quite comfortable. The zipper is sturdy. It is feminine and flattering. If you have an hourglass or pear shape this will work. I would question the cut on someone with narrower hips and a larger midsection/bust. Truly looks and feels more expensive than it is!
Love the color but it was to tight and did not fit correctly, it was smaller than a medium for sure, which is what size my wife generally is.
It fits well and it’s very pretty. The material and the cut makes it look expensive .
Very comfortable and elegant dress. Loved it and the size is correct.
Got last minute this to wear to a wedding. Fabric is thick and packed well without tons of wrinkles. Seems much higher quality than price tag. True to size
Love the flow of the bottom of the dress and Steve length is perfect too!
It was a little snug across my back so I had to size up, overall very pleased with the style and comfort!

I ordered this dress in XL in White and it fits me nicely with room to breathe. I bought this for a court house wedding and I am happy with it. The only reason this dress did not rate five stars is that its a bit see through and the slip is not long enough.  Easily fixed by adding a slip. Overall this dress is lovely & I would buy in more colors I like it so much. Arrived quickly

I bought this dress for a class reunion. It arrived today and I immediately loved the material and weight.  I ordered burgundy size small.  The color is rich and it fits like it was made for me. I bought skinny stretch belt to wear with it. And it's the perfect touch. This is already my favorite dress.

Loved this black dress - got in an X-Large just because I have wide shoulders - normally wear a medium in pants and large in tops - fits perfectly- material is very nice - not cheap and not too thin nor too thick - washes well
The fabric isn’t bad!  It’s nice. For the money it’s worth it.  The dress will last and looks nice for longer than one wear. I would recommend if you need a reasonable dress that is easy to wear.

I needed a blue dress for an awards ceremony and was looking for an option with sleeves, was knee length-ish, and had some movement. This was a hard search in the summer, but after playing around with search terms I found several options on Amazon, including this dress. I received numerous complements! The material had weight to it - it wasn't heavy, but felt quality, the high/low ruffled hem was stunning and fun, and the sleeves were perfect- not too long, not too short. And the blue was the perfect royal blue, so I was very pleased with this find, and it's under $50! My only criticism is the extra fabric inside the dress around the vneck. The vneck itself was not deep (so no worries there about cleavage), it was the perfect v, but the extra material underneath would not lay flat. You could see the outline of the seam through the dress ever-so-slightly. I was tempted to cut it off as close to the stitching as I could, but I didn't want to chance it before the event. In summary, if you are looking for a classy but fun, quality, special event dress, this is a great option.

Mom was needing a long dress for a fancy night on a cruise and I got her this.  It is pretty non-exciting without spiffing it up with a sparkly belt and jewelry though!  But, that's what makes it perfect, she can wear it to a funeral where it is understated and dress it up for formal night.
It’s a very flattering dress and my husband liked it. The fabric was too heavy for me. It wasn’t particularly comfortable.

This is the first time I’ve ever ordered a dress from Amazon and I am actually impressed and amazed at the beauty and quality of this dress!  I’m a size 22 and the 2XL size fits me perfectly. The color is just beautiful and the fabric feels thick and heavy. The dress is well made with gorgeous details. I’m sufficiently impressed enough that I’m wearing this dress to church on Easter Sunday.

The cut of this dress is very elegant. The material is soft and thick. One problem with is is that it is mostly Nylon. My wife said she feels the fabric is lacking something, although she cannot quite put her finger on it. It has some stretch and is quite form fitting. It will show undergarments through the material so you may need no-show undergarments. However, for the price, this is a great dress option and the minor flaws are not really that big of an issue considering that formal dresses typically go for much more. I give it 5-stars.

评论概述: This is a substantial, high-quality dress suitable for business and formal occasions
评论详情: For reference, I am 5ft 1in, 112lbs, 34 D/E chest, 27 waist, 37 hip. I ordered the small and it fits as expected. The black dress will be very suitable for any business event, funeral or other dressy occasion. It is modest but attractive and not dowdy. The fabric has good stretch so it will conform to your body without being tight. The fabric is thick enough it will not show every little fold, ripple and bump - so that's nice too. I love the bell sleeves and ruffle at the wrap hem, they add interest without being fussy.  I hope my review has been of some help. All of my reviews are my own honest opinion and my impressions of the product as I received it. I try to be as thoughtful as possible and to provide you with the information I would want to know about a product before spending my money on it. I am not paid to review products.

This dress is really pretty - the material is soft, stretchy, and thick so you don't have to worry about it being see through. The cut and sizing are right - you can order your normal size. It's stretchy so it'll hug your curves and is very flattering, but also modest enough to wear to a formal event. The color is also the same as the images - I got the wine red and it's the same shade as the pictures.

I am absolutely in love with the women's V Neck Bell Sleeve Formal Dress! This dress is pure magic, perfect for any special occasion where you want to make a statement.  Let's talk about those bell sleeves – they add such a whimsical and romantic touch to the dress, making me feel like a fairy-tale princess every time I wear it. And the V-neckline is just the right amount of elegant and flattering.  But what really sets this dress apart is the ruffle split detail. It adds a hint of flirtiness and movement to the dress, making it perfect for twirling around on the dance floor at weddings or cocktail parties.  Not to mention, the quality of the fabric is exceptional – it drapes beautifully and feels luxurious against the skin. Plus, the fit is absolutely perfect, accentuating all the right curves while still being comfortable to move in.  Overall, this dress is an absolute dream come true. It's elegant, feminine, and guaranteed to turn heads wherever you go. If you're looking for the perfect dress for a wedding guest, evening party, or any special occasion, look no further than this gem! Trust me, you won't be disappointed.

The Women's V Neck Bell Sleeve Formal Dress is an exquisite choice for wedding guests or any formal event. With its elegant V-neckline and bell sleeves, this dress exudes sophistication and grace. The ruffle split detail adds a touch of flair, while also offering ease of movement and comfort. Its timeless design makes it suitable for a variety of occasions, from weddings to evening parties. Crafted from high-quality materials, this dress ensures a flattering fit and a luxurious feel. Overall, it's a stunning option for those seeking a statement piece that combines style and elegance for any special occasion.
